jobDescription: Graphic DesignerBased in Santa Clara or San Francisco*Overview/Position Summary Responsible for working on a wide variety of project types: RFP’s, presentations, print, signage, marketing events, etc., in cooperation with the One Workplace Marketing and Sales teams. Receives direction and guidance from One Workplace’s Creative Brand Manager. Responsibilities:Develop and maintain key marketing and branding materials, including but not limited to RFP’s, presentations, brochures, magazines and event graphics.Work as part of a team with designers, copywriters, executives, etc.Prepare rough drafts of materials and present to the team for feedback and revisions.Amend final designs to internal feedback and gain full approval.Qualifications: Education/Experience  Bachelor’s Degree (B.A.) from a four-year college or university, plus at least 3 years related professional Graphic Design experience, with a strong portfolio. A combination of education and experience will be considered. Generally, works in an office environment around moderate noise. May work around moving and/or sharp objects. Has the flexibility to work out of our offices in Santa Clara, San Francisco or both.
